topic.title: Utilizing GenAI to Enhance Early-Stage Technical Content Creation (Presentation)

body.p: Generative Artificial Intelligence (GenAI) is a category of AI focused on creating content (text, images, videos, music, etc.), as opposed to traditional AI, which aims primarily at understanding or classifying data. And in the early-stages of writing technical documentation, GenAI can be used for at least two purposes:

ol.li: Generating a documentation draft from scratch.
Updating the existing text content based on recent changes in a product.

body.p: I've created a presentation titled Utilizing GenAI to Enhance Early-Stage Technical Content Creation about how generative AI can enhance your productivity in the early-stage technical content creation, and I've included this presentation below for our clients and integrators to gain a better understanding of the AI-Powered XML Editing tools we offer.
